title: The Pedestrian strikes back
creator_contributor_role: KNBC (Television station : Los Angeles, Calif.), production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns - United States
Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Public works - United States
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Shopping
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Shopping
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Urban renewal
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/City planning - Social aspects
description: Assesses the national trend of revitalising the downtown core of cities through the construction of malls, focusing upon Burbank's Golden Mall, and comparing it with similar projects throughout California. Authorities analyse the need for malls and discuss the difficulties encountered in providing them.
